Data: Khan to Wade, 1 wide that wasn't too far from being a wide. Back of a length, well outside off stump and it them seams away prodigiously. Ah it was called a wide after all.
Khan to Wade, no run short of a length outside off stump, Wade stays back and defends to the off side.

Khan to Wade, 2 runs dropped by Rohit Sharma at first slip. And the reason for the drop was that Rohit was positioned at second slip. This would have been a regulation take for Tendulkar to his left at first slip, but Rohit came flying across in front of him for a one-handed take. He gets h
Khan to Wade, 2 runs on Wade's pads, and he tucks it quite crisply through the leg side for a couple.
Khan to Wade, no run better line, Wade handles it carefully.
Khan to Wade, no run draws Wade marginally forward with a fuller length, and Wade defends down the track.
Khan to Wade, no run full length outside off stump, driven to cover solidly
Vinay to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, angled into Warner who is tucked up and defends from the crease.
Vinay to Warner, no run good lengths, can't be driven and can't be pulled. The line is good too, and Warner defends.
Vinay to Warner, no run stays on the back foot and defends again.
Vinay to Warner, 1 run width now, Warner sets up nicely and flays it behind square, but Zaheer tidies up at third man.
Vinay to Wade, no run angled across on a length, not much sideways movement for Vinay. Wade leaves.
Vinay to Wade, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Wade chops it square and picks up a single.
Khan to Wade, 1 wide no confusion this time. Another big wide from Zaheer, and Davis call is there for all to see.
Khan to Wade, no run he gets his outside edge again. Wade just seemed to be defending inside the line there, and the ball popped softly off the outer half, on the bounce to Tendulkar at first slip.
Khan to Wade, no run short of a length, wide of off stump and he lets it go.
Khan to Wade, no run goes a touch fuller and gets the ball to straighten from wide of off stump. Impressive carry for Zaheer as Wade shoulders arms.
Khan to Wade, no run draws his front foot out once more, and Wade again lets the ball go through to MSD
Khan to Wade, no run pitched well up on the stumps, Wade defends solidly down the track.
Khan to Wade, no run Wade stays cautious, reaches out to a full length ball and defends into the covers. He is a slow starter, but can take off once he gets in.
Vinay to Warner, no run short and wide, but not as short or as wide as Warner thought. He wanted to blaze it through the covers, but chops it to the off side without timing.
Vinay to Warner, no run gets good connection on the punchy cut this time, but finds point.

Vinay to Warner, no run electric from Kohli. This is the best Indian fielding side of all-time. Short ball outside off to Warner, who crashes it behind square and Kohli goes horizontal to his right at point to cut it off. Four runs saved.
Vinay to Warner, 2 runs Warner gets it away finally, stays back and steers off the face of the bat between point and cover for a couple.
Vinay to Warner, no run Vinay plugs away short of a length outside off, and Warner covers the line to defend to the point area.
Vinay to Warner, 1 run Warner squeezes another one past a prancing Kohli, and gets a single behind square on the off side.
Khan to Warner, 1 run Warner gets another single in front of point, staying back in his crease to a length ball and steering carefully.
Khan to Wade, 1 run too short to trouble Wade. He goes back in the crease and jabs a short ball towards third man for one more.
Khan to Warner, no run big seam movement from a shorter length. Warner stayed back and looked to lash it square, but it beat him by a good distance.
Khan to Warner, no run Zak goes fuller on the stumps, and Warner defends it to the off side.
Khan to Warner, no run gets him forward again, Warner meets it with a good forward press and plays to cover.
Khan to Warner, FOUR runs At long last, the first four of the day. Zaheer loses his line and strays down the leg side. Warner is inside the line and just helps it along to fine leg.
Vinay to Wade, no run Wade looks to wallop Vinay up and over the off side, but there's just no width to work with, and he misses it completely. Strange choice of shot.
Vinay to Wade, no run Vinay cuts one back in slightly from outside off, Wade tries to force it away square but plays it to point.
Vinay to Wade, 1 run goes too straight now, Wade skips and chips it through square leg for a single.
Vinay to Warner, 1 leg bye Vinay strays down the leg side now from round the stumps, and Warner can't get the glance away. Dhoni trots across to field the leg bye.
Vinay to Wade, 1 leg bye Wade walks right across the stumps and looks to ship, and the ball is again outside leg stump. Another leg bye taken behind square.

Vinay to Warner, 3 runs Warner's fore-arms to the .. well.. fore. Back of a length outside off stump, angling in to cramp a normal batsman, but Warner's far from normal. He manages to power it away through the covers with a vicious jab and picks up three more.

Khan to Warner, no run Jadeja's turn to dazzle at point. India cut off another four. Horror ball from Zaheer, hopelessly wide of off stump and it would have been called. Warner tries to thrash it behind point, but Jadeja's dive intervenes.
Khan to Warner, no run width again, Warner thumps it powerfully into the covers, but straight to Raina.
Khan to Warner, 1 run Wade responds late to Warner's call for a single after he pushed it to mid-off, but no hard done. They get the single easily.
Khan to Wade, no run good length ball just outside off, Wade covers the line and opens the face to defend to the off side.
Khan to Wade, 2 runs angled into the pads - Zaheer's having an indifferent start to his day. Wade works it through square leg for a single.

Khan to Wade, 3 leg byes another quiet turn to the leg side gets Wade a single. Aha, Vinay hits the stumps from fine leg, and the ricochet gets Australia an overthrow. It went off the pad to begin with. Did I get anything right there?
Vinay to Wade, no run length ball on off stump, defended to the off side.
Vinay to Wade, no run fuller length, Wade thumps into the off side and again picks out cover.
Vinay to Wade, 1 run single now, softens the grip and drops it to the off side.
Vinay to Warner, no run Warner covers the line as he moves across and defends down the track.
Vinay to Warner, no run fuller length, Warner just can't get them away. This time he mistimes the cover drive after plonking his front foot across.
Vinay to Warner, 1 run angles into the pads, Warner nudges to mid-on for a single... Another shy, another ricochet, but no overthrow this time.
Khan to Warner, no run comes in with the angle, and Warner's attempt to work it to the leg side ends up in a tangle. It hits the pad, but it was going down the leg side.

Khan to Warner, FOUR runs Warner will pinch himself to confirm that he has indeed got a four away through the off side. Zaheer gives him miles of width outside off and Warner does well to reach it. In fact it went off the toe end of the bat and flew between cover and point.
Khan to Warner, no run better line and length, Warner defends into the off side.

Khan to Warner, FOUR runs Zaheer's poor start continues. Over-pitched on off stump now, and Warner's shifting into gear rampantly now. Sets himself up beside the line, gets under the ball and trumpets it through the covers with a rasping drive.

Khan to Warner, SIX runs shot of the afternoon! Warner's yorked the boundary skirting at long-on with a rousing pick-up punch. Friendly length ball from Zaheer, who isn't moving the ball about anymore and Warner's thumped it rather disdainfully. Jabbed through the line, and he holds the pos
Khan to Warner, no run full again, Warner looks to get forward and is a touch late on the check drive to the off side. Super over this for Aus.

Vinay to Wade, FOUR runs Zaheer Khan goes down at third man with the grace of a Bollywood actor in an action scene, on the stunt double's off day. Width to Wade wide of off stump, and he cracks it square. Zaheer had a long way to run, and then went down like a crumbling building, but the ba
Vinay to Wade, no run
Vinay to Wade, 1 run on the pads, Wade tucks it square, and Jadeja nearly catches Warner napping with a quick pick up and throw, but he misses. Warner's in, and the 50 is up.
Vinay to Warner, no run over-pitched just outside off stump, Warner tries to clatter it through the off side, but misses. This pitch is much flatter than the first few overs suggested.
Vinay to Warner, no run Raina's chance now, at cover. Leaps up high to parry a hard smash into the turf that took off at pace. India are being generous with width to Warner.
Vinay to Warner, 1 run short of a length outside off, Warner pushes to cover and gets a single.
Pathan to Warner, 1 wide that didn't swing. It landed outside leg and kept floating further down. The loosest loosener you will see, at 117 kph.
Pathan to Warner, no run better everything. 124 kph, on off stump and keeping Warner back in the crease. He defends.
Pathan to Warner, no run angled into the pads, he's not got the first three balls to swing. Warner stays in the crease and plays it to mid-on.
Pathan to Warner, no run similar ball, Warner stays in the crease and plays it to the leg side with the angle.
Pathan to Warner, FOUR runs banged away. A bit of a sissy start this for Irfan. No pace, no movement, it sits up pleasantly outside off stump and Warner shows it the way to the cover boundary.
Pathan to Warner, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump now, Warner cuts behind point, and Gambhir trots around from third man to stop it.
Pathan to Warner, 1 run fuller length at 122 kph, Warner pushes a single to mid-on.
Raina to Warner, no run tossed up from round the stumps, driven off the front foot into the covers.
Raina to Warner, 1 run Warner stays back and defends behind point. Wade is again late to start for the single, but dives in to reach in time.
Raina to Wade, no run loopy ball on the stumps, Wade defends to the leg side.
Raina to Wade, 1 run drifted into the middle and leg line, pushed through wide mid-on for a single.
Raina to Warner, no run decent start from Raina. Fired in, gets the ball to straighten, and Warner works it square.
Raina to Warner, 1 run tossed up, Warner muscles it down the ground, but the Powerplay is over and long-on is back. Only a single.

Pathan to Warner, FOUR runs Warner is looking ominous. Another length ball that does nothing off the straight, on off stump. Warner leans out and lofts it up and over mid-off quite easily. Problems for India.
Pathan to Warner, 1 run full again at 132 kph, Warner creams another single to long-off, who has wisely gone back now.
Pathan to Wade, 2 runs Wade's turn to drive sumptuously into the covers now as Irfan over-pitches outside off stump.
Pathan to Wade, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Wade cracks it behind square for a single.
Pathan to Warner, no run full and wide, a Zaheer-type ball, and Warner somehow finds point again with his cut.

Pathan to Warner, OUT Irfan has struck. Tendulkar has taken a catch, and Rohit Sharma isn't anywhere near him this time. Soft dismissal, Irfan dangles it full with no pace on the pads, and Warner contrives to chip it uppishly straight at midwicket. India will breathe easy now. Warner looke
Raina to Wade, 1 run Raina moves so fast he over-runs the ball! Pitched up outside off, Wade drives it straight and Raina moves too far to his right as the ball goes to his left.
Raina to Ponting, no run full ball to Ponting, who leans out and works it watchfully to the leg side.
Raina to Ponting, no run shorter, Ponting goes back and nudges to the leg side.
Raina to Ponting, no run tossed up outside off, Ponting plays it back to Raina, who is hustling him by bowling his over very quickly.
Raina to Ponting, no run full ball outside off, defended again.
Raina to Ponting, no run another dot, as Raina keeps it full and gets Ponting to defend to the leg side.
Pathan to Wade, 1 run law of averages catches up with backward point. Jadeja misfields one. Some movement for Irfan, gets the ball to swing away, and Wade cuts hard for a single.
Pathan to Ponting, no run pitched up outside off stump, Ponting reaches out and defends to the off side.
Pathan to Ponting, no run back of a length outside off, Ponting steers gingerly to cover-point.
Pathan to Ponting, no run still on 0. Pitched up outside off, he leans out and check drives to mid-on.
Pathan to Ponting, no run pitched well up on the stumps, Ponting again drives to mid on.
Pathan to Ponting, no run Ponting is taking his time. Back of a length outside off stump, and defended to mid-off this time.
Raina to Wade, no run tossed up on the stumps, Wade defends to the off side.
Raina to Wade, no run full again, Raina's doing a top job. Defended to the off side.
Raina to Wade, 1 run Wade skips out to the flight of the ball and works it down wide of mid-on for a single.
Raina to Ponting, no run short ball, Ponting goes back and works it to mid-on. Not looking the part. At all.
Raina to Ponting, no run full ball, Ponting defends off the front foot again.
Raina to Ponting, 1 run stop the press. Ponting has a run. Leans out and opens the face to steer a single behind point.
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run just when we were talking highly of India's fielding, Zaheer Khan reminds us of the good old days. Lets a Ponting off drive go straight through the legs for a single.
Pathan to Wade, 1 run Wade works Irfan with the angle to square leg for a single.
Pathan to Ponting, no run pitched up on off stump, Ponting meets the ball with a forward press and plays it to mid off.
Pathan to Ponting, no run he's forward again, opens the face and guides to point.
Pathan to Ponting, no run and again, moves across and drives with a flowing blade into the covers. No intent to get a run there.
Pathan to Ponting, 2 runs whoa, Ponting jumps out and looks to carve up and over the off side. Thick outside edge, rolls down to third man, where Vinay does well to keep the runs down to two
Khan to Wade, no run well left outside the off stump by Wade, just a shade outside of
Khan to Wade, 1 run tries to whack that across the line but mistimes it to long-on, hurries the single and a direct hit would have been trouble
Khan to Ponting, no run Ponting tried to leave that but the ball hit the under edge and rolled to the keeper
Khan to Ponting, no run Pontin tries to clip that in the air over the on side but the ball clips his pads and rolls away
Khan to Ponting, 1 run Ponting tries to drive past cover but checks his shot and pats it to the off side, takes a quick single
Khan to Wade, no run Zaheer must have bowled three consecutive knuckle balls, Wade tries to work it to the on side but inside edges to the body
Vinay to Ponting, 1 run if only there had been a backward point he would have taken that comfortably, slashed on the up to the deep, Ponting looking circumspect
Vinay to Wade, no run Wade tries to cut that but ends up chopping it down to cover
Vinay to Wade, 1 run clips it to the leg side and Wade slips at the crease when turning around for the second, there was no second run anyway
Vinay to Ponting, no run gets across and pushes it softly down the track
Vinay to Ponting, 1 run good running, he punches it in front of mid-on and sets off quickly for the single
Vinay to Wade, no run fractionally short and a touch too wide and Wade fails to capitalise, he can only chop it down to point
Khan to Ponting, no run Zaheer hides the seam again, he gets behind the line and pushes it down the track

Khan to Ponting, OUT Ponting's struggle ends! He falls for the trap thanks to some intelligent field placing, drifts on the pads and he tries to loft over the leg side but ends up finding Irfan at deep backward square leg
Khan to Wade, 1 run excellent running, he drops it with very soft hands in front of the stumps and sets off quickly
Khan to Forrest, no run slower ball outside the off stump, Forrest is happy to let it go
Khan to Forrest, no run gets across and pushes it with soft hands towards cover
Khan to Forrest, 1 wide he loses control of that slower ball and slips it very wide outside off
Khan to Forrest, no run gets across and defends inside out to the off side, wasn't in control of that shot
Vinay to Wade, no run 135.1 kph, good delivery from Vinay angling in sharply from round the wicket, he gets it to move away after pitching and beats Wade
Vinay to Wade, no run slower ball and Wade shapes to slash it away but is foxed by the change of pace, could have got a nick there, it bounced before reaching Dhoni
Vinay to Wade, no run another excellent delivery! A jaffa which has Wade all at sea, the batsman withdraws the shot and drops his glove just as the ball fizzes past his blade
Vinay to Wade, 1 run slashes and makes proper contact this time, places it down to square third man
Vinay to Forrest, no run inside edge onto the thigh and the ball rolls to the off side
Vinay to Forrest, no run goes back at the crease and chops it to the off side
Raina to Wade, 1 run goes back at the crease and chops it to the deep on the off side
Raina to Forrest, no run goes back and punches it to short cover
Raina to Forrest, no run this one drifts and beats the outside edge! Close call
Raina to Forrest, 1 run goes back, waits for the turn and punches it to sweeper cover
Raina to Wade, 1 run full on the stumps and pushed down the ground to long-off
Raina to Forrest, 1 run a bit too short and he goes back and punches it to long-off
Yadav to Forrest, FOUR runs 142.5 kph, not the best of starts, short and wide and Forrest carves it over cover point, looked a touch risky at first
Yadav to Forrest, no run 139.3 kph, keeps it a touch closer to the off stump line and he's happy to leave it alone
Yadav to Forrest, no run 146 kph, much better, pitched up a bit further and invites the slash, beaten for pace
Yadav to Forrest, 1 wide 139.8 kph, bangs it in short and he has Forrest ducking
Yadav to Forrest, no run 145.5 kph, keeps it a touch outside the off stump and Forrest shoulders arms
Yadav to Forrest, no run 148 kph, straight on the body and he has to hurry on the back foot to defend
Yadav to Forrest, no run punches it to the off side and he sets off but quickly rushes back to his crease
Raina to Wade, 1 run gets forward and drives down to mid-off
Raina to Forrest, 1 run goes back and punches it down towards long-off
Raina to Wade, no run goes back at the crease and chops him down to point
Raina to Wade, no run Wade uses his feet and tries to force it past the off side but can't beat cover
Raina to Wade, no run gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Raina to Wade, no run tries to paddle it around the corner but fails to make proper contact
Yadav to Forrest, no run 146 kph, clips it down to mid-on
Yadav to Forrest, no run fuller delivery and he pushes it down to mid-on
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run ouch! Tendulkar's shin gets a hammering, outside edge which drops well short of Tendulkar at first slip, he gets his shin in the way, he seems to be fine now, no worries
Yadav to Wade, 2 runs short and slashed away down to third man, good running by Wade as he makes it well in time, before Gambhir's throw arrives
Yadav to Wade, 1 run makes a bit of room and crashes it down to mid-off and well stopped
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run bangs it in short on the body and he uneasily clips it in the air down to short square leg
Raina to Forrest, no run clips it to the on side
Raina to Forrest, no run
Raina to Forrest, 1 run goes back and punches it to the off side
Raina to Wade, SIX runs that's huge! As Shastri would have said. Comes down the track and lofts him high over wide long-on, Wade breaks the shackles
Raina to Wade, no run he leaves it to the keeper
Raina to Wade, no run gets forward and punches it to the off side
Yadav to Forrest, no run fullish on the pads and he clips it to mid-on
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run 152 kph, cranks up the pace further, he shuffles and clips him to the leg side
Yadav to Wade, no run 146 kph, bangs it in short and too quick for Wade as he arches back and tries to upper cut it over the slips
Yadav to Wade, 2 runs gets across and works him down towards deep backward square leg
Yadav to Wade, no run defends inside out towards point and he tells his partner to stay back
Yadav to Wade, FOUR runs a touch too full and in the right slot for Wade to play the booming off drive past mid-off and cover, Yadav needs to keep it a bit short to him
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, no run Rohit comes round the wicket, gets well forward and drives down the track
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run full again and clipped to the on side
Rohit Sharma to Wade, no run over the wicket to Wade, he gets across and pushes it to the off side
Rohit Sharma to Wade, OUT the bowling change works for India, Rohit cut back on the pace a bit, drew Wade forward for the chipped drive but he ended up spooning it straight back at Rohit, easy catch
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run goes back at the crease and he punches it to long-off
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 wide too wide down the leg side and he fails to make contact
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, no run drifts on the body and he clips it back to the bowler
Raina to Hussey, no run on the blockhole and he squeezes it back to the bowler
Raina to Hussey, no run defends to the off side

Raina to Hussey, no run Comedy of errors! The third umpire presses the wrong button would you believe it! Appeals for a stumping and Dhoni is quite confident, Raina bowls from round the wicket and beats Hussey on the drive through the off side, Hussey drags his back foot back and a part of
Raina to Hussey, no run
Raina to Hussey, no run
Raina to Hussey, 2 runs pushes it wide of point for a couple
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run goes back at the crease and punches it to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, FOUR runs short and pulled! Hussey rocks back at the crease and clubs it over midwicket
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and pushes it down to sweeper cover
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run comes round the wicket, he pushes it down to cover
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, no run gets across and stabs it to the off side
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run drifts on the pads and he clips it to midwicket
Raina to Hussey, no run punches it back to the bowler
Raina to Hussey, no run opens the face and steers it to point
Raina to Hussey, 1 run stays back and punches it down to long-on
Raina to Forrest, no run tucks him up for room and he punches it down the track
Raina to Forrest, no run drives down to mid-on
Raina to Forrest, 1 run gets an inside edge onto his pads and the ball rolls to short third man
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run comes down the track and he gets an outside edge to the off side
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run clips him down to square leg for a single
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run drops it with soft hands towards Raina and risks a single to Raina, Dhoni failed to collect the throw and Forrest was in trouble, Dhoni was not behind the stumps
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run goes back and clips him down to midwicket
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run goes back and punches it past cover
Raina to Hussey, 2 runs Chance, Over Rohit Sharma at short midwicket, short and pulled and Rohit tries to cup it over his head, needed lightning quick reflexes
Raina to Hussey, 1 run clips it behind square leg
Raina to Forrest, no run goes back and defends back to the bowler
Raina to Forrest, 1 run makes room and punches it down to cover
Raina to Hussey, 1 run lobbed in the air, Hussey tries to paddle it away and gets a top edge that drops at the vacant square leg region
Raina to Forrest, 2 runs rocks back and plays a short-arm pull down to long-on for a couple
Yadav to Hussey, 2 runs drifts on the pads and he clips him wide of long-on
Yadav to Hussey, 1 run angles across him and he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
Yadav to Forrest, no run 148.3 kph, nice and straight and Forrest is hurried on the back foot to defend
Yadav to Forrest, no run fullish on the off stump and he pushes it down the pitch
Yadav to Forrest, no run 126 kph, gets a hint of away swing and he dabs it down to point, good stop
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run he gets a bit of width and he opens the face and steers him down to third man
Pathan to Forrest, no run tucks him up for room and he has to arch back to defend
Pathan to Forrest, 1 run pulled and he wasn't in control of that, luckily it was wide of mid-on
Pathan to Hussey, no run Hussey beaten outside off, good delivery by Irfan tucking him up for room
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run a touch too short and he chips down the track and angles it down to third man
Pathan to Forrest, no run Forrest stays rooted to the crease and tries to cut but misses, Irfan has created two chances this over
Pathan to Forrest, no run drifts on the pads and he clips him down to midwicket
Khan to Hussey, 1 run full and swinging away and Hussey squirts it to mid-on
Khan to Forrest, 1 run on the blockhole and Forrest plays all over that one, manages to dig it out and the ball rolls to the off side and they steal a run
Khan to Hussey, no run goes on the back foot and defends it down the track
Khan to Hussey, 1 run goes back at the crease and angles it down to third man
Khan to Forrest, 1 run outside off and he lofts it down to sweeper cover but it drops well short of Jadeja, risky shot
Khan to Hussey, no run short of a length outside off and Hussey goes for the slash and misses it, close call again
Vinay to Forrest, 1 leg bye 131.8 kph, angles on the body and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
Vinay to Hussey, FOUR runs slapped that! Drops it short of a length from round the wicket, sits up nicely for Hussey to bludgeon that in front of square on the on side
Vinay to Hussey, FOUR runs making good use of the vacant spaces here Hussey, short and wide outside off this time and Hussey rolls his wrists and cuts wide of backward point
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run back of a length and he punches it down to point
Vinay to Forrest, 2 runs opens the face of the bat and he angles it wide of third man for a couple
Vinay to Forrest, no run goes back at the crease and punches it down the track
Khan to Hussey, no run goes back and defends

Khan to Hussey, 1 run Dropped Hussey chips down the pitch and tries to smash that over mid-off, Yadav had it covered, tried to cup it over his head and the ball slipped out, there was an outside chance of him taking it on the rebound if his reflexes were a bit better, that's the 50 stand
Khan to Forrest, 1 run shuffles and works it to the on side
Khan to Hussey, 1 run drives down the track and just beats the diving Zaheer
Khan to Forrest, no run on the blockhole and he drills it out
Khan to Forrest, no run slower bouncer and Forrest didn't know what to do with it
Vinay to Hussey, SIX runs exquisite lofted drive! Perfect length for Hussey to make a bit of room and crisply loft him over the sight screen, follow through was perfect
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run makes room and carves it to sweeper cover
Vinay to Christian, 1 run slower delivery and he pulls it down to deep midwicket
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run fires it on the blockhole and he makes room and squirts it to the off side
Vinay to Christian, 1 run makes room and forces it to sweeper cover, Yadav does well to limit that to a single
Vinay to Hussey, no run makes room and squirts out a full ball straight to point
Pathan to Christian, 1 run drifts on the pads and he clips it to the leg side
Pathan to Hussey, 2 runs hoicks a length delivery down to deep midwicket, didn't control if but good enough to take two
Pathan to Hussey, 2 runs full delivery swinging in and he drills it down to long-off
Pathan to Hussey, 1 wide
Pathan to Hussey, 2 byes Irfan totally lost control of that slower ball there! Tried to release it using his wrists like Murali, too wide outside the off stump
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run on the blockhole and it goes between his legs and a diving Dhoni gets a glove to it, the ball rolls to fine leg
Pathan to Christian, 1 run goes right across his stumps and tries to paddle it down to fine leg, drops it short of short fine leg
Yadav to Hussey, FOUR runs he's gifted a half volley on the pads and he moves across and clips it down to fine leg, used the pace of the ball there
Yadav to Hussey, no run fast full toss and Hussey fails to put that away, punches it back to the bowler
Yadav to Hussey, FOUR runs 141 kph, too short by Yadav, sits up nicely for Hussey as he swivels and plays the short-arm pull over square leg
Yadav to Hussey, 2 runs too straight and he clips it wide of fine leg
Yadav to Hussey, 1 run punches it to the off side for an easy single
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run Forrest plays an odd-looking shot, looked like he slapped that down to mid-off who was a bit deep
Khan to Forrest, 1 wide bangs it in short down the leg side and he swivels to pull but misses, wide called
Khan to Forrest, 1 run full on the pads and he clips it down to square leg
Khan to Hussey, 2 runs another full toss and Hussey stabs it past the bowler, long-off mops up
Khan to Hussey, no run goes back at the crease and knocks it back it to the bowler
Khan to Hussey, no run squirts out a yorker outside the off stump and Kohli fields at point
Khan to Hussey, 1 run had to scramble there, Hussey mistimed the pull down to mid-on and decided to risk a single to Jadeja, dives but a direct hit would have sent him back
Khan to Forrest, 1 run full on leg and he punches it down to long-on
Vinay to Christian, 1 wide he foxes Christian with a slower ball and he's still penalised for height, seemed a bit harsh at first considering the batsman was down the track
Vinay to Christian, FOUR runs smashes that one down the ground, Christian comes down the track and hammers a length ball over the bowler's head
Vinay to Christian, FOUR runs and again! Fuller delivery on the pads and he whams that so hard down the ground that long-on had no chance, brute power

Vinay to Christian, FOUR runs the helicopter shot! Comes down the track and hammers a full delivery outside off down to long-off, the follow through was something else, Dhoni would have been proud of that, but he's not smiling now
Vinay to Christian, FOUR runs now he goes across his stumps and paddles it down to fine leg! He beats short fine leg and it
Vinay to Christian, 1 run full on the pads and he clips it down to deep midwicket
Vinay to Hussey, no run some relief for Vinay as he bowls the slower ball and beats him outside off
Pathan to Christian, FOUR runs Beware of Christian! Fractionally short of a length on the off stump and he clubs that behind square on the on side, the bat speed was something else
Pathan to Christian, 1 leg bye good comeback, the yorker and he plays all around it, can't steal a leg bye
Pathan to Hussey, no run near-perfect yorker again, goes between his legs and he nearly loses balance at the crease
Pathan to Hussey, FOUR runs the slower ball and Christian picks it early and hoicks it over midwicket, the fielder in the deep may have been a bit too forward
Pathan to Hussey, 2 runs full on the pads and he clips it in the air down to deep square leg

Pathan to Hussey, 4 leg byes goes past Dhoni! Yorker on the pads, he makes room and the ball clips his pads, sneaks past the stumps and Dhoni moved to the wrong side, it evaded him and raced to third man
Looks like Dhoni will have to come up with something special again. Let's see how fit Tendulkar is. Join us soon.

Over 100 runs off the last ten overs and it was in contrast to the previous game at Adelaide where the Indians choked the Australians at the death overs. Dan Christian was in blazing form and his blitz has given Australia a very good score. We've seen how unpredictable India can be with the bat.

Welcome back. We're about five minutes away from the chase. Loud cheers as Tendulkar walks out. His shin's fine. Just watching the action from the T20 in New Zealand. India wouldn't mind batting there now, chasing this target at that stamp-sized ground in Hamilton.
Hilfenhaus to Gambhir, FOUR runs that knocks four off the target straightaway, swinging in and landing on the half volley, crisply driven down the ground wide of long-of
Hilfenhaus to Gambhir, no run swings away and he squeezes it out back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Gambhir, 1 wide down the leg side and Gambhir tries to run it down to fine leg and the bowler thought he got a touch to it
Hilfenhaus to Gambhir, no run
Hilfenhaus to Gambhir, 1 run inside edge on the drive and Forrest dives at square leg but can't cut it off cleanly
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, no run swings it away outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, 1 run swings it towards the off stump and he clips it towards mid-on, didn't look very comfortable when running
Lee to Tendulkar, no run he gets a fizzer from Lee straightaway, balloons up and Tendulkar fends it off one hand close to his face, luckily it drops short of Lee
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run fends off another short one to the off side and takes the single easily this time

Lee to Gambhir, OUT Lee has got rid of the in-form man! Peach of a delivery on the corridor outside the off stump, Gambhir was tentative on the defense, didn't move his feet across and he was beaten for a bit of extra pace too, thin edge taken by Wade
Lee to Kohli, no run stays right behind the line and defends
Lee to Kohli, no run wide and quick and he chops it towards slip, gets an under edge
Lee to Kohli, no run gets behind the line and punches it to the off side
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, 1 run steers it with the angle down to cover and pushes Kohli for the single, Tendulkar's shin seems to be fine, no apparent discomfort there
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run short of a length and he goes back and defends
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, 1 run a touch too wide and he opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, no run induces the false shot! Pitches it up and swings it away and Tendulkar slashes and misses
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, (no ball) he oversteps! Too full outside off and he can only drive it back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, no run Free Hit And Tendulkar fails to put it away, to the bowler's credit, it was quite difficult to hit, on the blockhole outside off
Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, no run another slash outside the off stump, Tendulkar's rooted to the crease
Lee to Kohli, no run 141 kph, angles it on the body and he stays back and defends
Lee to Kohli, no run 143.8 kph, Lee keeping it tight here, Kohli goes back and defends it solidly
Lee to Kohli, no run fuller in length and Kohli gets forward and solidly defends that
Lee to Kohli, 1 run crashed off the front foot and extra cover fumbled, the ball really flew off the bat on that occasion
Lee to Tendulkar, no run he tries to create a scoring opportunity by giving room but he steers it down to point

Lee to Tendulkar, no run There's an appeal for a catch to mid-on and the umpire Davis perhaps reckoned that hit his helmet, in fact he was right, it was a brute of a delivery that kicked up and balooned off the helmet and mid-on (Doherty) ran forward and took it, Davis was not interested, a
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, 2 runs short outside off and he carves it over cover point
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, 1 run Dropped Doherty this time! Kohli goes for a wild slash and the top edge swirls towards third man, Doherty does well to run across to his left but he fluffed it

Hilfenhaus to Tendulkar, OUT Doherty again! But this time he hangs on to it easily! Tendulkar arches backward to a short delivery to play one of his signature shots - the upper cut over the slips and third man - didn't get the elevation and Doherty at third man barely had to move
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run goes back and defends
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run short and wide and it was a boundary ball that had to be smashed but he stayed rooted to the crease and slashed and missed
Lee to Rohit Sharma, no run keeps it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
Lee to Rohit Sharma, no run 145.5 kph, left alone outside off again, good bounce and carry
Lee to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide the bouncer and it's too high for Rohit
Lee to Rohit Sharma, no run gets it to move away after pitching and asks questions for the batsman, good probing stuff from Lee
Lee to Rohit Sharma, no run the slower ball this time and he does well to get forward and defends

Lee to Rohit Sharma, OUT slashed and edged! Length ball outside off, Rohit is tempted to slash it away and he does by staying rooted to the crease, thick edge to Wade and Bowden raises the crooked finger and immediately cautions the batsman to wait, just to check if it was a front-foot no-b
Lee to Raina, no run pacy delivery outside off and he safely leaves it alone
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, 1 run shapes away from Kohli but he safely steers it down to third man
Hilfenhaus to Raina, no run chops it down to the off side and refuses the single
Hilfenhaus to Raina, 1 run they test him out with the short delivery and he flat-bats it down to square leg, looks like we'll see more such deliveries at Raina
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, 1 run tucks it down to deep square leg
Hilfenhaus to Raina, 1 run opens the face and runs it down to third man
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run gets good shape away from the right-hander and he leaves it alone
Lee to Raina, no run tucks him up for room and he chops it to the off side
Lee to Raina, FOUR runs good improvisation by Raina, he made just a hint of room to create more width to punch that past cover, good timing too
Lee to Raina, no run lands outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
Lee to Raina, 1 run gets a bit of width and he runs it down to third man
Lee to Kohli, no run a bit short of a length and he stays right back and defends it down the track
Lee to Kohli, 1 run opens the face of the bat and he steers it down to third man
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run Hilfenhaus getting good away movement again, Kohli safely leaves it alone
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, no run the spooned drive off the backfoot to point and the fielders get a bit excited
Hilfenhaus to Kohli, 3 runs nicely punched through the arc between cover point and cover and Warner does really well to slide and fire in that throw
Hilfenhaus to Raina, no run swings it in late and Raina gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
Hilfenhaus to Raina, no run nips it back in and traps him high on the pad above the line of the stumps
Hilfenhaus to Raina, no run drifts it inwards and Raina goes back and defends
Christian to Kohli, no run full outside the off stump and he thrashes that straight to extra cover
Christian to Kohli, 1 run gets across and nicely whips it off his pads in front of square on the on side
Christian to Raina, 2 runs Raina gets a big shuffle across and whips it high in the air behind square, Hilfenhaus is square at fine leg, no chance of catching it
Christian to Raina, no run goes right across his stumps and punches it on the up down to mid-off
Christian to Raina, no run gets across and defends back to the bowler
Christian to Raina, 1 run goes right across his stumps and clips it on the up down to deep square leg
Hilfenhaus to Raina, 2 leg byes strays on the pads and he shuffles and clips it past the keeper
Hilfenhaus to Raina, 1 run short and wide outside the off stump and he slashes it down to third man

Hilfenhaus to Kohli, OUT Appeal for a catch at slip, Kohli isn't sure if that carried to David Hussey at slip, outside edge travels low to Hussey's right and the catcher was certain he took it cleanly, the umpires have a chat and refer it upstairs, from the square leg angle it looked alrig
Hilfenhaus to Dhoni, no run gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
Hilfenhaus to Dhoni, no run gives him the charge straightaway and he pounds it straight to extra cover

Lee to Dhoni, no run this one really fizzes past the outside edge just wide of the off stump, good comeback
Lee to Dhoni, no run this time he allows it to go through to the keeper

Christian to Raina, OUT soft dismissal for Raina, won't exactly call it a wicket-taking delivery because it was slanting quite wide across the left-hander which could have been left alone, Raina couldn't resist chasing it and ended up driving away from the body, thick edge again

That's it from us. Thanks for your company. The cricket continues. Cheers everyone!
The debate over India's rotation will continue before their next match on Tuesday.
Australia won by 110 runs
Player of the match is Ben Hilfenhaus, AUS
